.. _contents:

ldaptool Documentation
======================

:Release: |release|
:Date: |today|

`ldaptool` is a collection of utilities to ease the maintainance of an LDAP tree
from the command line. It supports common unix operations such as `useradd`,
`passwd` and the like.

    :maxdepth: 2

    user
    dev
    license
